insert into t_fix_rate (id, fix_type, signout_type, signout_rate, signout_fee_rate, add_user, add_time, add_ip, remark, update_user, update_time, update_ip ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fixType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{signoutType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{signoutRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{signoutFeeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
